summary: Most PWA enablement work is present: a web manifest was added, index.html includes PWA metadata, a public service worker exists with basic caching logic, React registers the SW from an editable file, and unauthenticated pages show an install callout with an install button when installable plus an English fallback message. The diff does not show the required icon image assets being added, and it introduces unrelated unauthenticated-page content changes (welcome text/attribution/footer) not requested by the PWA requirements.

missing_requirements.requirement: frontend/index.html references a favicon and an Apple touch icon file that exist in the frontend public assets.
missing_requirements.reason: index.html references favicon and apple-touch-icon paths, but the diff summary does not show the corresponding image files being added/updated in frontend/public (only references to /assets/generated/*.png).

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide the required PWA image assets (192x192 icon, 512x512 icon, 512x512 maskable icon, 180x180 apple touch icon, 32x32 favicon) in frontend public assets.
missing_requirements.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly requires these images, but the diff summary does not include any added image files under frontend/public/assets/generated (only code/manifest/SW references to them).

hallucinated_features.description: Unrequested landing/intro marketing and attribution content changes (e.g., 'WELCOME TO VIBECHAT...' headline, 'by Joshua Koech', and a footer referencing 'caffeine.ai').
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-45 through REQ-49 focus on PWA manifest/metadata/SW/registration and install guidance UI; these additional content/branding/footer changes are not requested as part of PWA enablement.

hallucinated_features.description: Service worker updatefound logging suggesting reload-to-update behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-47/48 require baseline SW registration and lightweight caching; update availability logging is extra behavior not explicitly requested.
